languages.text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effects{/g} inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This bonus stacks.

The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

languages.text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}每击中一名敌人，装备者施加的所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果都会提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}每击中一名敌人，装备者施加的所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}都会提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемый персонажем, увеличивается на 1 до конца боя за каждого противника, затронутого {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} этого персонажа. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Уровень горения, накладываемый персонажем, увеличивается на 1 до конца боя за каждого противника, затронутого атаками по области этого персонажа. Эффект суммируется.
Уровень горения, накладываемый персонажем, увеличивается на 1 до конца боя за каждого противника, затронутого атаками по области этого персонажа. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者が与える{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果の威力は、戦闘が終了するまで、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に当たった敵1体につき1増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は戦闘終了時まで、その{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}によって影響を受けた敵1体につき、与えた{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のレベルを1獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: El poder de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} infligidos por el portador aumenta en +1 por cada enemigo afectado por sus {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} hasta finalizar el combate. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa.
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene +1 nivel de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} causado por él mismo por cada enemigo afectado por sus {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} hasta finalizar el combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Die Kraft der vom Träger verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekte wird für jeden von seinen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} betroffenen Feind bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1 erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist stapelbar.
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält +1 Stufe auf jeden von ihm verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} für jeden von seinen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} betroffenen Feind bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Addiert sich.

languages.text: La puissance des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligés par l'utilisateur augmente de +1 pour chaque ennemi affecté par les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable.
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur gagne +1 niveau par {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé pour chaque ennemi affecté par ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

L'utilisateur gagne +1 niveau par {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé pour chaque ennemi affecté par ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin oluşturduğu {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisinin gücü, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} etkilenen her düşman için +1 artar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.
